com.george.als.utils
Class UserInput

java.lang.Object
  com.george.als.utils.UserInput

public class UserInput
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds all the methods to get data from the user Each function uses a JOptionPane to get user input and return data

Author:
Georges Beast
